SUBSTRATE_NEURON_MODEL_PARAMS_CLASSES - Static variable in class com.ojcoleman.ahni.transcriber.TranscriberAdaptor
Optional property to allow specifying that instead of parameter values being defined individually for each neuron, there will be a set of parameter value collections which can be thought of as defining a class of neuron as determined by the specific parameter values (which will determine the behaviour of that class of neuron).

synapseDisableParamClassIndex - Variable in class com.ojcoleman.ahni.transcriber.HyperNEATTranscriberBainBase
If synapse parameter classes are being used (see TranscriberAdaptor.SUBSTRATE_SYNAPSE_MODEL_PARAMS_CLASSES, TranscriberAdaptor.synapseDisableParamName) and a synapse disable parameter has been specified (see TranscriberAdaptor.SUBSTRATE_SYNAPSE_MODEL_DISABLE_PARAM), then this should be set to the index of a SynapseConfiguration in the SynapseCollection passed to HyperNEATTranscriberBainBase.setSynapseParameters(SynapseCollection, int, com.ojcoleman.ahni.transcriber.HyperNEATTranscriber.CPPN, boolean, boolean) that has the disable parameter set to 0, otherwise it should be left with the value -1.
